text: Peter Murray James, OBE (born 19 September 1925),1928 according to some sources, but the earlier date is more frequently quoted. known professionally as Pete Murray, is a British radio and television presenter and actor. He was born in London, England. He is known for his career with the BBC. He hosted Six-Five Special (1957–1958) and appearing on Juke Box Jury (1959–1967). He also reported the Eurovision Song Contest for the BBC. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:Living people Category:Television personalities from London Category:Actors from London Category:BBC people Category:British radio personalities
title: Pete Murray (DJ)
